name: WouldYouRather(ShowMe)
0:
”Alexa, open Would You Rather”
”Alexa, start Would You Rather”
”Alexa, play Would You Rather”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: would you rather
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Would You Rather (Show Me) is an interactive game to help kids learn through social play. However, be careful what you say because I might ask you to show me!

Description
Would You Rather is a fun, educational experience to help kids learn through social play. By combining voice technology with tangible play, the ToyBot helps kids learn in a safe, natural, and engaging way - kids play the teacher!

SayKid recently won the Grand Prize in the Amazon Alexa EdTech Challenge! For more screen-free educational experiences, search "SayKid" on the Alexa Skill Store. 

If you enjoyed this experience, we’d really appreciate it if you could take a moment to leave us a review!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
